name: Hindrance
description:
Hindrance is an interactive 2D tablet experience, focused on dance and movement, developed by six ENJMIN students. In a poetic universe, guide a dancer step by step through this unusual mental journey, letting yourself be carried away by rhythm and hope.

Website : https://hindrancethegame.tumbl...

Controls

Reproduce the shape of the white lines that appears on the screen with your finger or your mouse. You can draw it where you want and as big as you want.

Created at the Cnam-ENJMIN, Angoulême (FRANCE), 2017
